short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Lets you view a professor's reviews on bruinwalk without having to search bruinwalk in another window.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step 1: Install the extension
Step 2: Visit a UCLA registrar page with professors on it
Step 3: Click on the professor's name to see his/her review on bruinwalk
Step 4: ????
Step 5: Profit
